alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 3:54PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Mitchell, southwestern Jewell, southeastern Smith and northeastern Osborne Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 354 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bellaire to near Downs. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Downs, Cawker City, Glen Elder, Lebanon, Portis, Esbon and Ionia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for north central Kansas.
